means: 同伴（同僚）之谊，友谊，同志关系

sentence.Network_en: Our comradeship and our brotherhood in war were unexampled.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在战争年代同舟共济的兄弟情谊是史无前例的.

sentence.Network_en: You will get no comradeship and no encouragement.
sentence.Network_cn: 你们得不到同志之谊,得不到鼓励.

sentence.Network_en: So much for the'comradeship of the road!'

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高中英语单词表 ... conceited a. 骄傲自满的，自负的 comradeship n. 同志关系；友谊 computer n. 计算机，电脑；计算者.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... partnership 合伙关系 comradeship 同志关系 fellowship 伙伴关系，交情.
英语构词法(常用的词根词缀总结)_百度文库 ... friendship 友谊, comradeship 同志之友谊, sportsmanship 体育道德.
大学生热血从军记(1)- 双语新闻 - 21英语网 ... preferential 优惠的 comradeship 同志友谊 hierarchy 等级制度.

list.abs: due to the highly centered political power , the relationship between examples and political authority will easily transfer from comradeship to aegis .由于政治权力的高度集中，典型与政治权威的关系往往会发生从同志关系向庇护主义关系的逆转。
He likes wine and enjoys comradeship ., 他爱酒同时享受友谊.
Showing comradeship ; brotherly ., 显出同志之谊的 ; 兄弟的.
It had always been pure friendship , pure comradeship , without any taint., 它一直是纯真的友谊 , 纯洁的同志 , 没有任何污点.

entry.def: Comradeship is friendship between a number of people who are doing the same work or who share the same difficulties or dangers.

example.tran: 他的战友们之间的同志情谊

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of affording easy familiarity and sociability

auth_sentence.content: The comradeship and discipline and 'sense of family' meant everything to him.
auth_sentence.res_content: The comradeship and discipline and 'sense of family' meant everything to him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The comradeship and discipline and 'sense of family' meant everything to him.

auth_sentence.content: You will also hear stories of great comradeship amongst men, across all colours and creeds.
auth_sentence.res_content: You will also hear stories of great comradeship amongst men, across all colours and creeds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You will also hear stories of great comradeship amongst men, across all colours and creeds.

auth_sentence.content: Reflecting on his visit, he suggested that mutual respect and comradeship had grown out of the horrors of war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Reflecting on his visit, he suggested that mutual respect and comradeship had grown out of the horrors of war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Reflecting on his visit, he suggested that mutual respect and comradeship had grown out of the horrors of war.

means.word_mean: 同伴(同僚)之谊,友谊;同志关系

sentences.en: Is it not chiefly because they upheld the principle of serving the people, established exemplary relations with the people through sacrificing their own interests, crated inside the armed forces a comradeship that brought the initiative of junior officers and the rank and file into full play, relied on the masses, analyzed the experience of each battle, and from battle to battle made continuous progress, both strategic and tactical?
sentences.cn: 难道主要地不是由于他们坚持为人民服务的立场，用自我牺牲的精神，树立了模范的军民关系，在部队内部建立了能够充分发扬下级官兵积极性的同志式的关系，并且依靠群众，总结每次战争的经验，从战术到战略都不断地得到进步的原故吗？
